meanings.sent1: The talented sketchers drew beautiful landscapes.
meanings.sent2: Art class was full of aspiring sketchers.
meanings.sent3: The sketchers at the park made funny caricatures of each other.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a sketcher, capturing every detail of the scene.
meanings.sent5: The sketchers' pencils danced across the paper, bringing their ideas to life.

meanings.sent1: I bought a new pair of Sketchers for my morning run.
meanings.sent2: Her favorite Sketchers were comfortable and stylish.
meanings.sent3: The dog chewed on my Sketchers, mistaking them for a toy.
meanings.sent4: His Sketchers were like clouds for his feet, making every step light.
meanings.sent5: The Sketchers logo on the shoes stood out, showing their quality.
